categories.title: Work Environment, Equipment and Hazardous Tasks

competencies.statement: I clearly understand my role and what is expected of me at work.
My role expectations are consistent and manageable.
I feel confident in my duty of care for others as part of my role.
The tasks I am expected to do are clearly defined.
The expectations in my role are aligned and supportive of each other.
My tasks and work standards are consistent and well-communicated.
The work I do feels valuable and purposeful.
I have opportunities to participate in decision-making processes.
I have control over my workload.
I have minimal influence and independence in how my work is carried out.
My skills are fully utilized in my current role.
I have a balanced level of interaction with people in my work.
My workload is reasonable and achievable within the given time.
I manage demands and deadlines effectively.
The expectations of my competence and responsibilities are realistic.
I have a variety of tasks in my work.
My work is meaningful and cohesive.
My job requires a balanced level of alertness and concentration.
I feel safe and supported when working with aggressive or distressed people.
I am rarely exposed to traumatic events or situations at work.
